overview: Ram Bahadur Bomjon (born c. 9 April 1990), also known as Palden Dorje, and now Dharma Sangha, is from Ratanapuri village, Bara district, Nepal. Some of his supporters have claimed that he is a reincarnation of the Buddha, but Ram himself has denied this, and many practitioners of Buddhism agree that the Buddha has entered nirvana and cannot be reborn.
tagline: The story of Ram Bahadur Bomjon, a teenage boy from Nepal believed to be the reincarnation of Buddha. Bomjon has drawn thousands of Buddhist pilgrims
title: The Boy with Divine Powers
